[Malicious Bane](/Feats.aspx?ID=1385) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tiefling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=258" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

---

Whether your heart is pure or corrupt, you can call forth a malediction upon your foes. You can cast [_bane_](/Spells.aspx?ID=18) once per day as a 1st-level divine innate spell.
